categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Rod" was the nickname of a clone trooper pilot in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars.

In 22 BBY, Rod participated in the Battle of Malastare during the Clone Wars. During the battle, he was the clone turret gunner of Goji's BTL-B Y-wing starfighter. While he tried to shoot down a few vulture droids, his bomber dropped the electro-proton bomb that deactivated the droid army and awakened the Zillo Beast.
Rod's Phase I clone trooper pilot helmet was custom painted with two winged creatures, one on each side of the helmet, displayed with wings spread in flight.
Rod was named for classic Japanese film monster Rodan.
